name: Alexstrasza
title: The Life-Binder
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Flame Stream
abilities.description: Fire two streams that deal 83 damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.

abilities.name: Oil Spill
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for 5 seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by 40%. Oil Spills are Ignited for 2.5 seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal 18 damage to them every 0.3 seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for 49 Health every 0.3 seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Jet Propulsion
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, charge forward. Colliding with an enemy Hero deals 52 damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

heroics.name: Bunker Drop
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1305 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 179 damage to enemies in a line. Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

heroics.name: Combustion
heroics.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 48 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extend the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds. Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.

original.name: Alexstrasza
original.title: The Life-Binder
original.description: Alexstrasza, the queen of dragons, was empowered by the titans to be the guardian of all life on Azeroth. She has aided mortals time and again, even at great personal cost. Now, she soars across the Nexus, protecting life wherever she finds it.
original.shortDescription: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.

baseHeroInfo.name: Alexstrasza
baseHeroInfo.title: The Life-Binder
baseHeroInfo.description: Alexstrasza, the queen of dragons, was empowered by the titans to be the guardian of all life on Azeroth. She has aided mortals time and again, even at great personal cost. Now, she soars across the Nexus, protecting life wherever she finds it.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

trait.name: Dragonqueen
trait.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health. While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, Slows, and Blinds is reduced by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Gift of Life
abilities.description: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an ally for 150% of that amount. Dragonqueen: Breath of Life Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

abilities.name: Abundance
abilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health. Dragonqueen: Preservation Heal area and amount greatly increased.

abilities.name: Flame Buffet
abilities.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds. Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost. Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

heroicAbilities.name: Life-Binder
heroicAbilities.description: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. After 2 seconds, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

heroicAbilities.name: Cleansing Flame
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health. 2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

otherAbilities.name: Breath of Life
otherAbilities.description: Heal an ally for 20% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

otherAbilities.name: Preservation
otherAbilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 30% of their maximum Health.

otherAbilities.name: Wing Buffet
otherAbilities.description: Deal 150 damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Cleansing Flame
otherAbilities.description: Take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health. 2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

skins.name: The Life-Binder
skins.description: Alexstrasza, the queen of dragons, was empowered by the titans to be the guardian of all life on Azeroth. She has aided mortals time and again, even at great personal cost. Now, she soars across the Nexus, protecting life wherever she finds it.

skins.name: Dragon Aspect Alexstrasza
skins.description: The many realms of the Nexus teem with myriad living beings who both empower Alexstrasza and beseech her for protection. The Aspect of Life stands ready to safeguard them all.

skins.name: Dark Queen Alexstrasza
skins.description: Sealed away by the Star Princesses millennia ago, the Dark Queen of the Dragons has finally broken free of her imprisonment. At long last, she will have her revenge on the people of Earth.
